official_title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning April 30, 1978, as "National Small Business Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of April 30, 1978, as "National Small Business Week."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning April 30, 1978, as "National Small Business Week".
